alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:58PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Okaloosa County through 345 PM CST... At 256 PM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Crestview to 5 miles south of Baker to 6 miles northwest of Wright to 6 miles southeast of Navarre Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Crestview, Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Valparaiso, Mary Esther, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Baker, Shalimar, Laurel Hill and Cinco Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
